p: The microbial food contamination poses a serious problem for producers, shortens on-shelf time, and may lead to life-threatening infections in humans. There are many microorganisms that can contaminate certain food, and for that reason, we chose three model microorganisms: Gram-positive Staphylococcus aureus, subsp. aureus; Gram-negative Escherichia coli; and a yeast Candida albicans [ 19].
